Package com.spire.pdf.annotations

Class Summary
LineBorder Represents the border style of the Line annotation.
Pdf3DActivation Represents the activation states for the 3D annotation.
Pdf3DAnnotation Represents the 3D annotation for a PDF document.
Pdf3DBackground Represents the background appearance for 3D artwork.
Pdf3DLighting Represents the lighting scheme for the 3D artwork.
Pdf3DRendermode Represents the rendering mode of the 3D artwork.
Pdf3DView Represents a attributes to be applied to the virtual camera associated with a 3D annotation.
Pdf3DViewCollection Represents a collection of Pdf3DView objects.
PdfActionAnnotation Represents the annotation with associated action.
PdfActionLinkAnnotation Represents base class for link annotations with associated action.
PdfAnnotation Represents the base class for annotation objects.
PdfAnnotationBorder Represents the appearance of an annotation's border.
PdfAnnotationCollection Represents collection of objects.
PdfAnnotationWidget Represents the base class for loaded annotation classes.
PdfAttachmentAnnotation Represents an attachment annotation.
PdfAttachmentAnnotationWidget Represents the attachment annotation from the loaded document.
PdfDocumentLinkAnnotation Represents annotation object with holds link on another location within a document.
PdfDocumentLinkAnnotationWidget Represents the loaded document link annotation class.
PdfFileAnnotation Represents a base class for file attachment annotation.
PdfFileLinkAnnotation Represents the annotation link to external file.
PdfFileLinkAnnotationWidget Represents the loaded file link annotation class.
PdfFixedPrint Created by sky.luo on 2020/8/18.
PdfFreeTextAnnotation The Spire.Pdf.Action namespace contains classes used to create pdf action elements.
PdfFreeTextAnnotationWidget Represents the free text annotation widget.
PdfInkAnnotationWidget The classes used to create pdf ink annotations widget elements.
PdfLineAnnotation Represents a line annotation.
PdfLineAnnotationWidget Represents the loaded line annotation class.
PdfLinkAnnotation Represents the base class for link annotations.
PdfMarkUpAnnotationWidget  
PdfPolygonAnnotation Represents the polygon annotation.
PdfPolygonAnnotationWidget Represents the loaded text Polygon annotation class.
PdfPopupAnnotation Represents a Base class for popup annotation which can be either in open or closed state.
PdfPopupAnnotationWidget Represents the loaded pop up annotation class.
PdfRubberStampAnnotation Represents the Rubber Stamp annotation for a PDF document.
PdfRubberStampAnnotationWidget Represents the loaded rubber stamp annotation class.
PdfSquareAndCircleAnnotation The Spire.Pdf.Action namespace contains classes used to create pdf action elements.
PdfStyledAnnotationWidget The Spire.Pdf.Action namespace contains classes used to create pdf action elements.
PdfTextAnnotationWidget Represents the PdfTextAnnotationWidget.
PdfTextMarkupAnnotation Represents the text markup annotation.
PdfTextMarkupAnnotationWidget Represents the loaded text markup annotation class.
PdfTextWebLink Represents the class for text web link annotation.
PdfTextWebLinkAnnotationWidget Represents the loaded text web link annotation class.
PdfUriAnnotation Represents the Uri annotation
PdfUriAnnotationWidget Represents the loaded unique resource identifier annotation class.
PdfWatermarkAnnotation Created by sky.luo on 2020/8/18.
PdfWatermarkAnnotationWidget Created by sky.luo on 2020/8/19.
PdfWebLinkAnnotationWidget Represents the loaded web link annotation class.
 

Enum Summary
Pdf3DActivationMode Specifies the available modes for activating a 3D annotation.
Pdf3DLightingStyle Specifies the available styles for applying light to 3D artwork.
Pdf3DRenderStyle Specifies the available rendering style of the 3D artwork.
PdfAnnotationFlags Specifies the enumeration of the annotation flags.
PdfAnnotationIntent Specifies the enumeration of the annotation intent.
PdfAttachmentIcon Specifies the type of icon to be used in displaying file attachment annotations.
PdfBorderEffect Specifies the border type is to be used in the Line annotation.
PdfLineCaptionType Specifies the Line Caption Type is to be used in the Line annotation.
PdfLineEndingStyle Specifies the Line Ending Style to be used in the Line annotation.
PdfLineIntent Specifies the Line Intent Style is to be used in the Line annotation.
PdfMarkupAnnotationRelyType Specifies the enumeration of the annotation intent.
PdfPolygonIntent Specifies the enumeration of the annotation intent.
PdfPolyLineIntent Specifies the enumeration of popup annotation icons.
PdfPopupIcon Specifies the enumeration of popup annotation icons.
PdfRubberStampAnnotationIcon Specifies the enumeration of rubber stamp annotation icons.
PdfSquareAndCircleAnnotationType Created by zone.duan on 2020/4/27.
PdfTextMarkupAnnotationType Specifies the Style of the Text Markup Annotation
